summary: VA's community care program refers eligible veterans to a health care provider in their community if they can't access care at a VA facility. VA has had challenges scheduling community care appointments in a timely way. So, Congress required VA to measure elapsed time between and across points in the care process, specifically when: Care is requested A referral is sent to a community care...
title: Veterans Community Care Program: Additional Information on VA Statutory Appointment Timeliness Measurements is Needed
